decision.reasoning: All robots are currently dead with 0.0 battery. No reassignments or actions are possible until robots are somehow revived or recharged. M020 is identified as a high-priority pending mission, but cannot be addressed at this time. The fleet is incapacitated.

All robots (R1, R2, R3) are currently dead with 0.0 battery, rendering them inoperable. Therefore, no reassignments can be made, and no missions can be actively pursued at this time. The most critical pending mission, 'M020' (High priority), cannot be started until robots are recharged or repaired.

Both active high-priority missions, M001 and M003, are currently in progress with dedicated robots R1 and R3 respectively. Robot R2 is idle with full battery, but there are no unassigned missions requiring immediate action. Therefore, R2 will remain idle, ready for any new tasks that may arise.
